QueryResult.text: SELECT NVL(INV_PROJECTS.PRUID, TO_CHAR(INV_INVESTMENTS.ID)) PRUID , INV_INVESTMENTS.ID PRID , INV_PROJECTS.PRGUIDELINES , INV_PROJECTS.PRDEPARTMENT , INV_PROJECTS.PRVERSION , INV_PROJECTS.PRUSERTEXT6 , INV_PROJECTS.PRUSERTEXT7 , INV_PROJECTS.PRBUDGET , INV_INVESTMENTS.SCHEDULE_START PRSTART , INV_PROJECTS.PRASOF , INV_INVESTMENTS.SCHEDULE_FINISH PRFINISH , INV_PROJECTS.PRCPMTYPE , INV_INVESTMENTS.TRACK_MODE PRTRACKMODE , INV_INVESTMENTS.IS_OPEN_FOR_TE PRISOPEN , INV_INVESTMENTS.CHARGECODEID PRCHARGECODEID , INV_PROJECTS.PRSPONSOREDBY , INV_PROJECTS.PRREQUESTEDBY , INV_PROJECTS.PRREQUESTEDTIME , INV_INVESTMENTS.APPROVEDTIME PRAPPROVEDTIME , INV_PROJECTS.PRUSERTEXT1 , INV_PROJECTS.PRUSERTEXT2 , INV_PROJECTS.PRUSERTEXT3 , INV_PROJECTS.PRUSERTEXT4 , INV_PROJECTS.PRFORMAT , INV_PROJECTS.PRFISCALSTART , INV_PROJECTS.PRUSERTEXT5 , INV_PROJECTS.PRPCTCOMPLETE , INV_INVESTMENTS.PRIORITY PRPRIORITY , INV_PROJECTS.PRCLOSEDTIME , INV_INVESTMENTS.MANAGER_ID , INV_PROJECTS.PRSIZEADJUST , INV_PROJECTS.PRSIZEADJUSTON , INV_PROJECTS.PRSTARTIMPOSED , INV_PROJECTS.PRFINISHIMPOSED , PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.START_DATE AS PRBASESTART , PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.FINISH_DATE AS PRBASEFINISH , PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE AS PRBASETIME , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM CMN_SEC_USERS WHERE ID=INV_INVESTMENTS.LAST_UPDATED_BY) PRMODBY , INV_INVESTMENTS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE PRMODTIME , INV_INVESTMENTS.SLICE_STATUS , INV_INVESTMENTS.IDEA_ID , INV_INVESTMENTS.PROCESS_CODE , INV_INVESTMENTS.STAGE_CODE , NULL AS CATEGORY_CODE , INV_INVESTMENTS.GOAL_CODE , INV_INVESTMENTS.ALIGNMENT , INV_INVESTMENTS.RISK , INV_INVESTMENTS.STATUS_INDICATOR , INV_INVESTMENTS.STATUS_COMMENT , INV_INVESTMENTS.PROGRESS , INV_INVESTMENTS.STATUS , FIN_FINANCIALS.BUDGET_CST_TOTAL BDGT_CST_TOTAL , FIN_FINANCIALS.BUDGET_CST_START BDGT_CST_START , FIN_FINANCIALS.BUDGET_CST_FINISH BDGT_CST_FINISH , FIN_FINANCIALS.BUDGET_CST_ONHOLD BDGT_CST_ONHOLD , FIN_FINANCIALS.BUDGET_CST_RESUME BDGT_CST_RESUME , FIN_FINANCIALS.BUDGET_REV_TOTAL BDGT_REV_TOTAL , FIN_FINANCIALS.BUDGET_REV_START BDGT_REV_START , FIN_FINANCIALS.BUDGET_REV_FINISH BDGT_REV_FINISH , FIN_FINANCIALS.BUDGET_REV_ONHOLD BDGT_REV_ONHOLD , FIN_FINANCIALS.BUDGET_REV_RESUME BDGT_REV_RESUME , FIN_FINANCIALS.FORECAST_CST_TOTAL FCST_CST_TOTAL , FIN_FINANCIALS.FORECAST_CST_START FCST_CST_START , FIN_FINANCIALS.FORECAST_CST_FINISH FCST_CST_FINISH , FIN_FINANCIALS.FORECAST_CST_ONHOLD FCST_CST_ONHOLD , FIN_FINANCIALS.FORECAST_CST_RESUME FCST_CST_RESUME , FIN_FINANCIALS.FORECAST_REV_TOTAL FCST_REV_TOTAL , FIN_FINANCIALS.FORECAST_REV_START FCST_REV_START , FIN_FINANCIALS.FORECAST_REV_FINISH FCST_REV_FINISH , FIN_FINANCIALS.FORECAST_REV_ONHOLD FCST_REV_ONHOLD , FIN_FINANCIALS.FORECAST_REV_RESUME FCST_REV_RESUME , FIN_FINANCIALS.BUDGET_NPV BDGT_NPV , FIN_FINANCIALS.BUDGET_ROI BDGT_ROI , FIN_FINANCIALS.BUDGET_BREAKEVEN BDGT_BREAKEVEN , FIN_FINANCIALS.FORECAST_NPV FCST_NPV , FIN_FINANCIALS.FORECAST_ROI FCST_ROI , FIN_FINANCIALS.FORECAST_BREAKEVEN FCST_BREAKEVEN , FIN_FINANCIALS.IS_FCST_EQ_BDGT , INV_INVESTMENTS.CURRENCY_CODE , FIN_FINANCIALS.IS_CALC_PV_INFO , INV_INVESTMENTS.APPROVEDBY_ID , INV_PROJECTS.PROCESS_SCALE_BDGT , INV_PROJECTS.PROCESS_SCALE_WORK , NULL AS INV_VERSION , NULL AS INV_TCO , NULL AS INV_SUPPLIER , NULL AS INV_POPULATION_SERVED , NULL AS INV_LICENSE_COUNT , NULL AS INV_FUNCTION_POINTS , NULL AS INV_TECHNOLOGY , NULL AS INV_PLATFORM , INV_PROJECTS.RCF_OBJECTIVES , INV_PROJECTS.RCF_SPONSORSHIP , INV_PROJECTS.RCF_FUNDING , INV_PROJECTS.RCF_RESOURCE_AVAIL , INV_PROJECTS.RCF_INTERDEPENDENCY , INV_PROJECTS.RCF_TECHNICAL , INV_PROJECTS.RCF_HUMAN_INTERFACE , INV_PROJECTS.RCF_ORG_CULTURE , INV_PROJECTS.RCF_SUPPORTABILITY , INV_PROJECTS.RCF_IMPLEMENTATION , INV_PROJECTS.RCF_FLEXIBILITY , INV_INVESTMENTS.IS_REQUIRED , INV_INVESTMENTS.BASELINE_ID , INV_PROJECTS.LAST_CALC_RUN FROM ODF_CA_INV ,INV_INVESTMENTS , FIN_FINANCIALS , ODF_OBJECT_INSTANCE_MAPPING ,INV_PROJECTS LEFT OUTER JOIN PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS ON INV_PROJECTS.PRID = PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.OBJECT_ID AND 'PROJECT' = PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.OBJECT_TYPE AND 1 = PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.IS_CURRENT WHERE INV_INVESTMENTS.ID = ODF_CA_INV.ID AND INV_INVESTMENTS.ID = INV_PROJECTS.PRID AND INV_INVESTMENTS.ID = ODF_OBJECT_INSTANCE_MAPPING.PRIMARY_OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID AND ODF_OBJECT_INSTANCE_MAPPING.SECONDARY_OBJECT_INSTANCE_CODE = 'financials' AND ODF_OBJECT_INSTANCE_MAPPING.PRIMARY_OBJECT_INSTANCE_CODE='project' AND ODF_OBJECT_INSTANCE_MAPPING.SECONDARY_OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID = FIN_FINANCIALS.ID AND INV_PROJECTS.IS_TEMPLATE = 0
